text: A Patch of Blue is a 1965 American drama movie directed by Guy Green and based on the 1961 novel Be Ready with Bells and Drums by Elizabeth Kara. It stars Sidney Poitier, Shelley Winters, Elizabeth Hartman, Wallace Ford, Ivan Dixon, John Qualen and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 5 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1966. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1965 drama movies Category:1960s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Guy Green Category:Movies about blind people
title: A Patch of Blue
